# Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
```

# Build Empty DF
```{r}
# making a df!
variable <- NA
estimate <- NA
mean <- NA
standard_error <- NA
p_value <- NA
model_number <- NA
session <- NA

#sexy sexy empty df
df <- data.frame(variable, estimate, mean, standard_error, p_value, model_number, session)
```

# Adding the first model
```{r}
#all first model of 117th
df[1, ] <- list("Intercept", "0.1480", "2.2394", "0.0035", "0.53", 1, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Religion", "-0.0033", "-0.2045", "0.0012", "0.53", 1, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Party", "-0.0150", "-0.1447", "0.003", "0.23", 1, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Ideology", "-0.0229", "-0.2823", "0.003840998", ".19", 1, 117)

#all first model of 112th
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Intercept", "0.0986", "1.4671", "0.0032", "~0.00", 1, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Religion", "-0.0036", "0.4130", "0.0011", "0.53", 1, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Party", "0.0129", "0.2131", "0.0027", "0.38", 1, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Ideology", "0.0178", "-0.5254", "0.0036", "0.37", 1, 112)
```


# Adding second model
```{r}
#adding second model for 112th
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Intercept", "0.1140", "95.6599", "0.0007", "~0.00", 2, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Catholic", "-0.0026", "0.0632", "0.0021", "0.77", 2, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Jewish", "-0.0161", "0.0079", "0.0082", "0.48", 2, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Other", "0.0345", "0.0642", "0.0134", "0.32", 2, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Protestant", "-0.0041", "-0.4574", "0.0012", "0.74", 2, 112)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Unknown", "0.0859", "0.2463", "0.0576", "0.23", 2, 112)

#adding second model for 117th
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Intercept", "", "", "", "~0.00", 2, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Catholic", "", "", "", "", 2, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Jewish", "", "", "", "", 2, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Other", "", "", "", "", 2, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Protestant", "", "-", "", "", 2, 117)
df[nrow(df) + 1, ] <- list("Unknown", "", "", "", "", 2, 117)
```
